evidence.claim: Gaia Software utilizes AWS cloud infrastructure for their services.
The platform complies with HIPAA regulations and provides secure handling of health data.
Integration with FHIR standard is mentioned in their developer documentation.
X12 transaction set support is available through their EDI processing.
They utilize Azure for scalable data platforms and integration services.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in health tech with strong API integration for EDI and X12 transactions.
